title: GE Inspira alternative?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091024114915im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture-4_3767.gif)

I know VAG is pretty close, but i am looking for not-so-straight letters. Also the j’s are very special on the VAG Rounded, i’m looking for something more standard.

Any close alternatives?

GE Inspira is a GE font btw, so thats why i cant use it.
author: cuidado

comments.content: What about [FS Albert](http://web.archive.org/web/20091024114915/http:/www.fontsmith.com/fonts.php?font_num=100)? Straight as well, but less strict.

I was also thinking FS Albert, and Bryant:  
 [http://www.processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/bryant2/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20091024114915/http:/www.processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/bryant2/index.html "http://www.processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/bryant2/index.html")
Sandy, you’re not making knock-off dishwashers or jet engines are you ;-)

Thanks guys, good alternatives.

Sii\> hope not! :)
